closed_reason: Added slot="prefix" attribute to the sl-icon element inside the create button in tick-header.ts:282. The icon was missing this required Shoelace slot attribute which prevented it from rendering visibly within the button component.
description:
The create new tick button in the header has no visible icon or text - appears empty/blank.

Check tick-header.ts create button - likely missing sl-icon or text content.
title: Fix: New tick button missing plus icon/text
